job description:
Love your job!

Our client, located in the Los Angeles area, is seeking a top notch Data Scientist (with financial transaction data experience) who can join their growing team.

Exceptional salary, benefits, and relocation are all available.

REQUIREMENTS
  • Degree in Statistics or related field.
  • Prior experience as Data Scientist
  • Experience with financial transaction data.
  • R, Python
  • SAS, SPSS
  • Develop rules and models to detect risk in portfolios.
  • Multivariate Regression, Logistic Regression, clustering algorithms, Support Vector Machines, Decision Trees
  • Predictive Modeling
#LI-SK1
